about.description:
The LSC Algorithm Inference Library for gravitational wave data
analysis.  This package contains the Python bindings of
the LALInference C libraries and additional Python modules.

Note: this package only provides the importable Python libraries.
All command-line interfaces, scripts, and executables are
part of the `lalinference` package.
about.summary: LSC Algorithm Inference Library Python libraries

name: python-lalinference
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.21.4
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
  name: python-lalinference
  version: 3.0.0
source:
  patches:
    - no-gsl_version-check.patch
  sha256: e3bad2f0f3a0458abcde440426743697eaa06d596ed4191a03afc2b0d8b4f215
  url: http://software.ligo.org/lscsoft/source/lalsuite/lalinference-3.0.0.tar.xz
build:
  error_overdepending: true
  error_overlinking: true
  ignore_run_exports:
    - openssl
    - python
  number: 1
  string: py39h470dbf4_1
requirements:
  build:
    - ca-certificates 2021.10.8 h033912b_0
    - cctools_osx-64 949.0.1 h6407bdd_23
    - cctools_osx-arm64 949.0.1 h55de48a_23
    - clang 11.1.0 h694c41f_1

    - crossenv 1.0 pyhd8ed1ab_2
    - gettext 0.19.8.1 hd1a6beb_1008
    - ld64_osx-64 530 he8994da_21
    - ld64_osx-arm64 530 h3681fde_21
    - ldid 2.1.2 h6a69015_3
    - libblas 3.9.0 12_osx64_openblas
    - libcblas 3.9.0 12_osx64_openblas

    - libcxx 12.0.1 habf9029_0
    - libffi 3.4.2 he49afe7_4
    - libgfortran 5.0.0 9_3_0_h6c81a4c_23
    - libgfortran5 9.3.0 h6c81a4c_23
    - libiconv 1.16 haf1e3a3_0
    - liblapack 3.9.0 12_osx64_openblas
    - libllvm11 11.1.0 hd011deb_2
    - libllvm12 12.0.1 hd011deb_2
    - libopenblas 0.3.18 openmp_h3351f45_0
    - libzlib 1.2.11 h9173be1_1013
    - llvm-openmp 12.0.1 hda6cdc1_1
    - llvm-tools 11.1.0 hd011deb_2
    - lz4-c 1.9.3 he49afe7_1
    - make 4.3 h22f3db7_1
    - ncurses 6.2 h2e338ed_4
    - numpy 1.19.5 py39h7eed0ac_2
    - openssl 3.0.0 h0d85af4_1
    - pcre 8.45 he49afe7_0
    - pkg-config 0.29.2 h31203cd_1008
    - popt 1.16 h7b079dc_2002
    - python 3.9.7 h38b4d05_3_cpython
    - python_abi 3.9 2_cp39
    - readline 8.1 h05e3726_0
    - rsync 3.2.3 h652f650_3
    - sed 4.7 h3efe00b_1000
    - sqlite 3.36.0 h23a322b_2
    - swig 4.0.2 hce5123c_2
    - tapi 1100.0.11 h9ce4665_0
    - tk 8.6.11 h5dbffcc_1
    - tzdata 2021d he74cb21_0
    - xxhash 0.8.0 h35c211d_3
    - xz 5.2.5 haf1e3a3_1
    - zlib 1.2.11 h9173be1_1013
    - zstd 1.5.0 h582d3a0_0
  host:
    - ca-certificates 2021.10.8 h4653dfc_0
    - libblas 3.9.0 12_osxarm64_openblas
    - libcblas 3.9.0 12_osxarm64_openblas
    - libgfortran 5.0.0.dev0 11_0_1_hf114ba7_23
    - libgfortran5 11.0.1.dev0 hf114ba7_23
    - liblalinference 3.0.0 he77efb5_1
    - liblapack 3.9.0 12_osxarm64_openblas
    - libopenblas 0.3.18 openmp_h5dd58f0_0
    - libzlib 1.2.11 hee7b306_1013
    - llvm-openmp 12.0.1 hf3c4609_1
    - ncurses 6.2 h9aa5885_4
    - numpy 1.19.5 py39h1f3b974_2
    - openssl 1.1.1l h3422bc3_0
    - python 3.9.7 h54d631c_3_cpython
    - python_abi 3.9 2_cp39
    - readline 8.1 hedafd6a_0
    - sqlite 3.36.0 h72a2b83_2
    - tk 8.6.11 he1e0b03_1
    - tzdata 2021d he74cb21_0
    - xz 5.2.5 h642e427_1
    - zlib 1.2.11 hee7b306_1013
  run:
    - astropy >=1.1.1
    - h5py
    - healpy >=1.9.1
    - liblalinference 3.0.0 he77efb5_1
    - ligo-segments
    - lscsoft-glue >=1.54.1
    - matplotlib-base >=1.2.0
    - numpy >=1.19.5,<2.0a0
    - python >=3.9,<3.10.0a0
    - python-lal >=7.1.0
    - python-lalburst >=1.5.3
    - python-lalinspiral >=2.0.0
    - python-lalmetaio >=2.0.0
    - python-lalpulsar >=3.1.0
    - python-lalsimulation >=3.0.0
    - python-ligo-lw
    - python_abi 3.9.* *_cp39
    - scipy >=0.9.0
test:
  commands:
    - python -m pytest -ra -v test/python/
  imports:
    - lalinference
    - lalinference.bayespputils
    - lalinference.imrtgr
    - lalinference.imrtgr.imrtgrutils
    - lalinference.imrtgr.nrutils
    - lalinference.imrtgr.pneqns
    - lalinference.lalinference_pipe_utils
    - lalinference.nest2pos
    - lalinference.plot
    - lalinference.tiger
    - lalinference.tiger.make_injtimes
    - lalinference.tiger.omegascans_dag
    - lalinference.tiger.postproc
    - lalinference.wrapper
  requires:
    - pytest >=4.0.0a0
  source_files:
    - test/python
about:
  description: 'The LSC Algorithm Inference Library for gravitational wave data

    analysis.  This package contains the Python bindings of

    the LALInference C libraries and additional Python modules.


    Note: this package only provides the importable Python libraries.

    All command-line interfaces, scripts, and executables are

    part of the `lalinference` package.

    '
  dev_url: https://git.ligo.org/lscsoft/lalsuite/
  doc_url: https://docs.ligo.org/lscsoft/lalsuite/lalinference/
  home: https://wiki.ligo.org/Computing/LALSuite
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: COPYING
  summary: LSC Algorithm Inference Library Python libraries
extra:
  copy_test_source_files: true
  feedstock-name: lalinference
  final: true
  recipe-maintainers:
    - duncanmmacleod
    - skymoo
    - vivienr
